search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Recruiterflow (recruiterflow.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Recruiterflow is here: [https://recruiterflow.com/pricing](https://recruiterflow.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Transparent Pricing for Your Growing Recruitment Needs - Recruiterflow

extracted_content.content:
Base

$99
---

/User/Month

Best suited for emerging agencies beginning their recruitment operations journey.

Get Base

This plan includes

*   Unlimited Jobs
*   Unlimited Candidates and Contacts
*   Branded Careers Page
*   Click to Call and Texting
*   Reports

MOST POPULAR

Pro

$109
----

/User/Month

Great for agencies aiming to streamline and scale their recruitment operations.

Get Pro

All Base Plan Features, plus:

*   Sourcing using Chrome Extension
*   Access Control
*   Custom Activity
*   Campaign Templates
*   Multi-Channel Email and SMS Campaigns
*   API Access
*   RF GPT

Advanced

$129
----

/User/Month

Created for agencies requiring a complete and sophisticated recruitment operations solution.

Get Advanced

All Pro Plan Features, plus:

*   Recruitment Automation
*   Sales Automation
*   Bulk Import Using Chrome Extension
*   Auto Disqualification
*   Automation Templates
*   AI-powered Candidate Matching
*   Find Similar Candidates Using AI
*   Custom User Teams

Easy-to-learn, solid software that is active and focused in rolling out new features when they are ready and not too early.

Founder, Thornley Corporate Solutions

Excellent feature set. The automation of daily tasks and triggered events is a life saver.

![Image 9: user images](https://d30417wqrqt2r9.cloudfront.net/static/css/images/profile-pictures/james-huntingford.png)

MD, Sydney James Global

Ease of use and customer support are a big thing for my business. I absolutely love this product.

Sr Recruiting Consultant, ITEOM Talent

I'm a big fan based on the speed of the system, how easy it is to customize, and all of the automation capabilities!

I've consolidated almost all of the software I use to use to do my job, into one easy to use package

![Image 15: user images](https://d30417wqrqt2r9.cloudfront.net/static/css/images/profile-pictures/amanda-daering.png)

![Image 16: graphic images](https://d30417wqrqt2r9.cloudfront.net/static/css/images/blue-circle.png)

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

###### Can I upgrade/downgrade from one plan to another?

Yes you can! You can upgrade or downgrade from any plan at any time without any additional cost. You will be charged according to the new plan and change your billing cycle.

###### Can I pay yearly and get a discount?

Yes you can. Our discounted prices are mentioned in the pricing chart.

###### Can I mix annual and monthly licenses or can I pick just one?

Yes you can. For example, if you want to purchase 5 licenses, you can purchase 3 annual and 2 monthly licenses.

###### What job boards does Recruiterflow integrate with?

Recruiterflow integrates with 15+ job boards like Indeed, LinkedIn, Glassdoor, ZipRecruiter, etc. You can find the complete list of all job boards at recruiterflow.com/integrations.

###### Is there a training and setup fee?

Nope. We will setup Recruiterflow for your needs without any additional charges. No hidden charges.

###### What’s an email lookup?

An email lookup is when we successfully find someone's email id through our chrome extension. This is an add-on and you can purchase lookups at $20 for 100 lookups.

###### Do I need a credit card to start my trial?

No you don’t. You can get started with a free trial whenever you want.

###### What integrations does Recruiterflow support?

We have integrations with multiple tools ranging from document management tools, workforce management tools, productivity & collaborative tools, etc. You can find the complete list of all integrations at recruiterflow.com/integrations.

Compare Recruiterflow’s different plans best suited for recruiting & staffing agencies and Executive Search Firms

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual pricing discounts are available, and plans can be mixed between annual and monthly licenses.

Great for agencies aiming to streamline and scale their recruitment operations.

additional_fees.fee_description: Cost for 100 email lookups using the Chrome extension.
